notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected areas with waters as detected bySentinel-1 imagery acquired the 08 December 2014 in Can-Avid municipality, west of Dolores city, Eastern Samar Province (Philippines). The heavy rains related to the typhoon Hagupit induced areas with standing waters that affected 460 ha of agriculural fields. This analysis has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR /UNOSAT.
